name: Awesome Candy Pizza Pie Chocolate Dessert Shop Maker - Cooking games
name_original: Awesome Candy Pizza Pie Chocolate Dessert Shop Maker - Cooking games
description:
Who's ready to make some Candy Pizzas!

Top Crazy Games is bringing you the best cooking and baking game with all of your favorite candy pizza party recipes. Play now!

Features:
- Choose your dough: Regular, Chocolate Chip, Sponge, Chocolate, Cookies n Cream, Candy
- Make dough and roll it out by dragging ingredients
- Choose your favorite chocolate sauce: All flavors
- Many toppings to choose from: Frosting, Fruits, Candy, Chocolate, Sprinkles
- Choose your cut. 2 slices, 4 slices, square slices.
- EAT IT ONCE! EAT IT AGAIN AND AGAIN!

Dozens to choose from:
- Toppings
- Different combinations!
- and More!!!!!

Play it for yourself.

Download this game right now and have fun making and mixing!

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app. You can adjust your device settings to deactivate in app purchasing.
